data.title: 2006 - Perkin H - History of Universities
data.meta_description: 2006_Perkin H_History of universities - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a history of universities from their origins in medieval Europe to their current role in modern society. It discusses how the first universities arose out of cathedral and municipal schools in 12th century Europe to train elites for the church, state, and professions. They became autonomous institutions that could offer speculative thought and challenge authority. Over time, universities adapted to serve different societies, from the medieval world to the needs of industrial and post-industrial societies through mass higher education. The history shows their evolution into flexible institutions that spread worldwide.
